_description: On Christ’s Blood — four monorhyming lines in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.Transcription:
Crist lay an loude greddeHis armis fro him wide spreddeblod an
                    water longe bleddeWith þat blod vs alle fedde
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 36.
